Text: Thanks for these. Before I download them, could you explain why so many Jonathan Edwards books are so big -- e.g., Freedom of the Will, mobi, 143 mb.?

I think that one is just one big image formatted into MOBI. 

I don't see anything strange in it. Feel free to scan it though.

Thanks for the response.

Potential downloaders for this or any of your "mega pack" torrents should know there's a lot here for everyone -- the "Christianity" label should be interpreted loosely, since there are books on history, atheism, and other subjects, written from various perspectives, though the majority are Christian books from the neo-Calvinist perspective.
I tried to include some from a number of perspectives. There should be enough here to offend everyone. :)
Thanks, Spanikopita for the time and effort you put into this amazing collection and others. Really appreciate
